of Public Prosecutions, said the Crown Prosecution Service( CPS) would conduct a`` comprehensive assessment'' of evidence collected by detectives about the`` phone hacking'' at the News of the World paper. The purpose of this assessment is to ascertain whether there is any material which could now form evidence in any future criminal prosecution relating to phone hacking, the CPS said in a statement. When you order every American to buy health insurance whether they want it, need it or not, that's a government takeover of healthcare,'' said Nancy Pelosi Mike Pence , R-Indiana, on the floor. Really? Who is taking over what health care plan? Who? We are offering people tax incentives, small businesses tax incentives to go buy private insurance plans, answered Nancy Pelosi Anthony Weiner , D-New York.
